attributes.action: The PM should live on an average wage on a council estate for one month to see what life is ACTUALLY like!
attributes.additional_details: The Prime Minister has no idea what life is really like for normal people. If he were to live on an average wage for one month he might begin to understand the difficult choices people in this country have to make. He's happy to tell us we have to make them but does he really know what it is like?
